alert.note: Alert for Shannon (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 02 at 8:42AM CST until March 05 at 3:00PM CST by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Springfield MO has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Missouri... Current River near Powder Mill affecting Shannon County. Jacks Fork at Alley Spring affecting Shannon County. .Rainfall accumulations of two to three inches with isolated higher amounts between tonight and Friday morning will likely lead to the Jacks Fork and Current Rivers rising above flood stage. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING TO SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Current River near Powder Mill. * WHEN...From Friday morning to Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, County Road 106-531 south of the gage floods near the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 AM CST Thursday the stage was 2.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tomorrow morning to a crest of 10.0 feet early Saturday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Saturday afternoon. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Many flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
